text:
From the lenya welcome page, go for the default publication and instead of
importing the example content, create a new first page of type xhtml. This new
page then reads "Click on the menu "File", "edit with BXE" (Firefox users) or
"File", "edit with Kupu" (Explorer users)"

However, there is no BXE/Kupu option in the edit menu (except for Meta data) for
both lenya and alice.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
andreas@apache.org
text: I'm facing this problem too sometimes, but I didn't find the cause yet.
I didn't see this for quite some time now. Anyone else?
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: Well, we can reopen it if it occurs again.
creator: andreas@apache.org
